name: Cook the Book: Grasslands Herb Salsa
description: On the border between Inner Mongolia and Siberia there is a wild town called Manzhouli. It was here, over a meal of lamb hot pot, that the authors first came across this thick herbaceous condiment. Their version of that green...
recipeIngredient: 2 cups packed coriander leaves and stems, or substitute mint leaves
1/2 cup coarsely chopped scallions (white and tender green parts)

recipeInstructions.text: Place the herbs and scallions in a food processor or a mini-chopper and process to a coarse paste. Add the vinegar and salt and pulse to blend. Alternatively, use a mortar and pestle to reduce the greens to a coarse paste, then add the vinegar and salt and mix well. Taste and adjust the seasoning if you wish.
Transfer to a small serving bowl and serve with a small spoon so guests can help themselves.
